TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp.1009-1010
TEI.2.document_title: Anthony R. Clarke to Stephen F. Austin, 01-02-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: Anthony R. Clarke to Austin, January 2, 1825. Plans for moving to Texas. House of entertainment.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1009-1010

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Anthony R. Clarke to Austin, January 2, 1825. Plans for moving to Texas. House of entertainment.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Autoyack*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="01-02-1825">2nd Jany 1825 */date_mentioned**/p**p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*Since my return home the influence of *person_mentioned*John I Clarke*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*Monk*/person_mentioned* an others have put *person_mentioned*Mrs Page*/person_mentioned* quite in favour of moving to the *location_mentioned*Brassos*/location_mentioned*. it is by her request that I now write you to request that if it is not too late you will reserve a League of land for us. if proper you may enter it in the name of *person_mentioned*Mrs Eliza Page widow */person_mentioned*of the late *person_mentioned*Wm A. Page*/person_mentioned* and her three *person_mentioned*sons */person_mentioned*or in my name if the above should not be proper *person_mentioned*Mrs Page*/person_mentioned*s object in that *location_mentioned*Country*/location_mentioned* would be to make a living by keeping a *location_mentioned*house of entertainment*/location_mentioned*, for this purpose I should require *location_mentioned*two lots in Town*/location_mentioned* a joining as one would be too small to hold the necessary *location_mentioned*buildings */location_mentioned*and *location_mentioned*stables*/location_mentioned*, I should likewise stand in need of a Labour to furnish firewood and timber as well as raise corn and vegetables for the *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*—If I can arang my business as I have a prospect of doing my plan is to come out and put up the necessary building in the *date_mentioned n="Spring-1825">Spring*/date_mentioned* and then move out, I wish you would write me in answer to this which must determin my coming to the *location_mentioned*Brassos*/location_mentioned*—- I wish my Idea of moving to the *location_mentioned*Brassos*/location_mentioned* may not be made public as it would injure the sale of my improvement here*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Anthony K Clarke*/person_mentioned* [Rubric] */p**p*Col *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* */p* */div1*
